version_description:
Improvements and fixes make it easier to enjoy the game! Download a new update and get:

- City credits loss after suspend bug fix
- More minor bugs and issues fixed

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

ALL-NEW GRAPHICS! Check out the world's best city builder, now with a completely refreshed look!
T-MINUS 2 MINUTES! Don your space suit because it’s Five... Four... Three... Two... One... BLASTOFF!
ASTRONAUT IN NEED! Hire friends to help with launch pad construction and space shuttle preparations!
A CLUSTER OF STELLAR QUESTS! Complete 17 new missions to finally take a walk among the stars.
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED! Ensure success with a mission control center, radio telescope and observation station.
HONOR THE SPACE PIONEERS! Build a monument to commemorate your city’s leap into space exploration.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Everyone wishes the carefree feeling of summer could last forever. But now it actually can with this brand new update of your favorite city builder!

WELCOME TO THE FUN FACTORY! Buckle up for your most high-octane construction project yet. Build an amusement park and provide unforgettable thrills for everyone!
WHERE ADVENTURES AWAIT– Reel in the crowds by adding a shooting gallery, comic book shop, remote-controlled car race track and much more!
TEAM WORK – Hire your friends as part of the top-notch crew you need to pull your project off. Construction workers, engineers, entertainers and retailers are all essential!
SHARE YOUR SUCCESS – Take a picture of your awesome theme park and post it on Facebook. Now everybody knows what you’ve accomplished!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

This new free update of your favorite city-builder will keep you busy building your dream city for weeks!

NEW BETTER INTERFACE - Treat your eyes with beautiful HD interface.
SEE YOUR CITIZENS IN THEIR DAILY LIFE - Watch your happy citizens wander around their growing city, taking selfies and enjoying the outdoors.
BUILD AN ICONIC HOLLYWOOD STUDIO - Add a new entertainment building to help the industry boom.
BUILD A NEW TYPE OF HOUSES FOR YOUR CITIZENS - Construct row houses for your citizens.
50+ NEW QUESTS - Over 50 uplifting new quests to captivate your imagination and keep you busy for weeks.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Enjoy lazy summer days with this brand new update of your favorite city builder!
BUILD AND RUN YOUR OWN ZOO – Create your ideal zoo and learn to care for gorgeous animals!
CONSTRUCT UNIQUE BUILDINGS – Break ground on a pet shop, grooming salon and oceanarium.
TOP 1,000 PLAYERS RATINGS – Review the top players and strive to join this elite group!
NEW DECORATIONS – Install animal monuments, including a deer, kangaroo, lion, giraffe and hippo.
20 MORE QUESTS – Tackle new challenges while expanding your city’s urban core.
IMPROVED INTERFACE – Treat your eyes to a more visually appealing interface.
PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATIONS – Your favorite game now runs even faster and smoother!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Update 1.17.3:
Enjoy warm Indian Summer days with this brand new update of your favorite city builder!
IMPROVED INTERFACE – Treat your eyes to a more visually appealing interface.
Update the game and continue to run the city of your dreams!

Update 1.17
BUILD AND RUN YOUR OWN ZOO – Create your ideal zoo and learn to care for gorgeous animals!

PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATIONS – Your favorite game now runs even faster and smoother!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Winter is in the air – and with it comes the season of ice skating, holiday markets and heartwarming magic! Download this festive update and turn your city into your very own winter wonderland!

WINTER EVENT – Build a beautiful Santa's Castle, enjoy powdery snow covering the buildings and get special holiday gifts.
NUMEROUS QUESTS – Tons of challenging new quests will keep you entertained for months.
UNIQUE BUILDINGS & HOUSES – Make your city the perfect place to live with a new Ballet School and Post Office, plus charming new Victorian homes, townhouses and more.
NEW HOTEL – Construct a Victorian Hotel in the heart of downtown and offer your guests cozy lodging at a great value.
IMPROVED INTERFACE – Treat your eyes to a more visually appealing interface. 

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Update 1.18.2
Update your favorite city-building game and make your city the best place to live ever!
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – New optimizations will help you build faster and easier. 

Update 1.18
NUMEROUS QUESTS – Tons of challenging new quests will keep you entertained for weeks.
UNIQUE BUILDINGS & HOUSES – Make your city the perfect place to live with a new Ballet School and Post Office, plus charming new Victorian homes, townhouses and more.
NEW HOTEL – Construct a Victorian Hotel in the heart of downtown and offer your guests cozy lodging at a great value.
IMPROVED INTERFACE – Treat your eyes to a more visually appealing interface.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

PLAY ON MULTIPLE DEVICES – Your game progress is now saved across all your devices, so play as you want.
NEW QUESTS – Tackle over 120 challenging new quests to improve the environment, grow the population and boost happiness!
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Experience these important optimizations for yourself.

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

It's summer now, and life is buzzing in your city! Update the game and continue building the best place to live ever!

FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – The game is only getting better! Check it out!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Your dream city is buzzing with anticipation! So what significant event is going to take place next? Download this fresh update and find out!

MAJOR ATHLETIC EVENT – Your city has been selected to host the world's biggest sports competition. Develop a complete athletic village, including a biking track, beach volleyball court and sporting goods store. 
INSPIRING DECORATIONS – Erect statues of famous athletes to get everyone in the mood for greatness.  
SOLAR HOTEL – Provide green accommodations for all the teams and tourists by building an amazing Solar Hotel.
NEW QUESTS – Tackle over 28 challenging new quests to ensure your city is ready for the games to begin.
BUG FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Your favorite city builder is only getting better. Check out the latest version now!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail

Download this fresh update of your favorite city builder and continue creating dwellings, shopping malls, cinemas, stadiums and other important buildings. Have more fun than ever!

WHEEL OF FORTUNE – Are you lucky? Tempt fortune! Twist the wheel and win cool gifts.
FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS – Experience these important optimizations for yourself!

Join the G5 email list and be the first to know about sales, news and game releases! www.g5e.com/e-mail
